TopicTitle: Meet the team page on the website

Articles.Content:
I am 95% certain I remember the old website had a page where you could see all the past and present devs names, and kerbal versions of the current ones.

I cannot for the life of me find that sort of page on the new site. Was it removed?
It wasn't so much removed as it wasn't included in the new website. What is it you want to know?
